Two thumbs down! Throw him to the lions!
Have to agree with you. Dip him in powdered sugar and lock him in a cage with a wolverine that's high on angel dust.

It looks like they gave him the max - Death.
 
 A few people stated that the jury "showed no mercy" by giving him the death penalty, but I think they really showed more mercy than letting him live with, not only the fact that he murdered his wife and child, but with so many inmates that would make him wish that he'd been put to death.
 
 Also, some say that the death penalty is not considered justice, but revenge.
 
 To me it doesn't matter how a person sees it, Peterson was the dumbest criminal to ever execute a premeditated murder......
lol axe him quick before he gits away I say emoticon_rolleyes

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Scott Peterson - it's thumbs time!
